definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Assuming you are prepared to spend money wasted.
Journal Zhenghun by my cousin, wronged a lot of money, but to no avail.
sentences.chinese: 我表哥通過雜誌徵婚，冤枉錢花了不少，卻沒有成效。

sentences.english: "Listen, you don't have to spend that kind of money, " Mike replies.
sentences.chinese: “我跟你說，你不用花那冤枉錢，”麥克說。

sentences.english: Don’t waste money on poor-quality used shoes.
sentences.chinese: 不要在質量差的舊鞋上花冤枉錢。

sentences.english: Don't waste money on poor-quality used shoes.
sentences.chinese: 不要在質量差的舊鞋上花冤枉錢。
